title: Rettai kadire Lyrics Maattrraan Songs Lyrics
stanzas:
Singers : Krish, Balaji, Mili & Sharmil  
Music: Harrish Jeyaraj
Movie: Maatraan
Lyrics: Na MuthuKumar
Lyrics in Thanglish
Exact translation of tamil words

Rettai kadire, idho nee naan naam
pakkam irundhum, dhooram edharku ?
Yettum varayil engum nee naan naam
pattri padari thozhai nimirthu

Dheera dheera dheera dheera
dheera dheera dheera dheeerei

Vannam veru vaanam veru
iruvarin kadal veru

Puyal adithum vazhuthe
iru paravai oru kuttil..
Methu methuvaai pookatum
intha pookal ethir kattril

Rettai kadire, idho nee naan naam
pakkam irundhum, dhooram edharku ?
Yettum varayil engum nee naan naam
pattri padari thozhai nimirthu

Nimmu nimmu Nimmu nim ahkhaa
Nimmu nimmu Nimmu nim ahkhaa
Nimmu nimmu Nimmu nim ahkhaa
Nimmu nimmu Nimmu nim

You touch me
Nimmu nimmu Nimmu nim
You touch me
Nimmu nimmu Nimmu nim

Karuvaachu udal uruaazhu
adhu thavaraachu
iru uyiraachu, irandum valarndhaachu

Ennakaachu adhu unnkaachu
ini puviellaam ada pudhu kaatchi
varudam urundaachu

Ivan oru pakkam,avan marupakkam
idhu eddhuvo ?
Ada poovum thalaiyum serndha
pakkkam podhuvo?!!

Rettai kadire, idho nee naan naam
pakkam irundhum, dhooram edharku ?
Yettum varayil engum nee naan naam
pattri padari thozhai nimirthu

Ivan vaarthai mazhai thuliyaaga
avan maru vaarthai sara vediyaaga
inainthum thaniyaaga

Nadhi pole ivan manam poga
perum puyal pole avan seyal poga
yaaringae inaiyaaga

Ivan kannadi avan munnadi
tharum uruvam, idhu pirinthal
kuda ondrai nirkum thuruvam

ooh ooh ooho ..yeah yeah..
pa pa pa pa pa
ooh ooh ooho ..yeah yeah..
yeah yeah yeahh..

rettai kathire idho ne naan naam
pakkam irunthum dhooram yetharku?
ettum varaiyil engum nee naan naam
patri padri tholai nimirthu

Dheera dheera dheera dheera
dheera dheera dheera dheeerei

come a long way..here to stay..
